SELECT COUNT(*) FROM I_SCHEDULE_RECORD WHERE 1=1 AND CONFIG_SEQ = #configSeq#
USE_YN = #useYn#
START_YEAR = #startYear#

SELECT CONFIG_SEQ, (SELECT TITLE FROM I_HISTORY_CONFIG WHERE SEQ = X.CONFIG_SEQ ) AS CONFIG_NAME, SEQ, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_NAME, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_FMT, USE_YN, START_YEAR, START_MONTH, START_DAY, END_YEAR, END_MONTH, END_DAY FROM I_SCHEDULE_RECORD X WHERE 1=1 AND CONFIG_SEQ = #configSeq#
USE_YN = #useYn#
START_YEAR = #startYear#
START_MONTH = #startMonth#
ORDER BY START_YEAR DESC, START_MONTH ASC, START_DAY ASC, SEQ DESC

SELECT CONFIG_SEQ, (SELECT TITLE FROM I_HISTORY_CONFIG WHERE SEQ = X.CONFIG_SEQ ) AS CONFIG_NAME, SEQ, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_NAME, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_FMT, USE_YN, START_YEAR, START_MONTH, START_DAY, END_YEAR, END_MONTH, END_DAY FROM I_SCHEDULE_RECORD X WHERE CONFIG_SEQ = #configSeq# AND SEQ= #seq#
sqlMap.procedure: DECLARE I_COUNT NUMBER; I_SEQ VARCHAR2(10) := #seq#; BEGIN SELECT COUNT(SEQ) INTO I_COUNT FROM I_SCHEDULE_RECORD WHERE SEQ = I_SEQ; BEGIN IF I_COUNT <> 0 THEN UPDATE I_SCHEDULE_RECORD SET CONTENTS = #contents#, USE_YN = #useYn#, START_YEAR = #startYear#, START_MONTH = #startMonth#, START_DAY = #startDay#, END_YEAR = #endYear#, END_MONTH = #endMonth#, END_DAY = #endDay#, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE, MOD_ID = #modId#, MOD_IP = #modIp# WHERE SEQ = I_SEQ; ELSE INSERT INTO I_SCHEDULE_RECORD ( CONFIG_SEQ, SEQ, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_NAME, REG_IP, START_YEAR, START_MONTH, START_DAY, END_YEAR, END_MONTH, END_DAY, USE_YN ) VALUES( #configSeq#, I_SEQ, #contents#, #regId#, #regName#, #regIp#, #startYear#, #startMonth#, #startDay#, #endYear#, #endMonth#, #endDay#, #useYn# ); END IF; END; END;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE I_SCHEDULE_RECORD SET USE_YN = #useYn#, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE SEQ = #seq#
